article:
Manyue is a 3-year-old girl. Her father _ AIDS  and died. Her mother also fell sick with the same illness. One day, Grandpa Wang took Manyue to the _ to see her mother, who looked pale and tired. She said, "My dear child, I'm going to _ you soon and stay with your father." "Can I go with you?" Manyue asked. Mum said _ , "Your father is too far away and you're too young to go there, _ we will come back to see you on the night with a full moon."
Soon after Manyue's visit, her mother _ her journey to see her dad. Manyue began to live with Grandpa Wang. "The _ moon will come during the harvest   just like your mother said," Grandpa Wang told her sadly.
 _ the moon was full, Grandpa Wang and Manyue had their visitors from a _ . Manyue was shy in front of the strangers. Smiling kindly, a young lady said, "I'm going to be _ mother. Please come home with me. " Then Manyue went to her new home. Now she lives in a tall building in the city. She's happy now.
